scripts.start: cd ./vue && npm run build & cd ./apos && npm run start
scripts.dev: cd ./vue && npm run build:watch & cd ./apos && npm run dev
scripts.install:app: npm install && cd ./vue && npm install && cd ../apos && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:vue && npm run lint:apos
scripts.test: npm run test:vue && npm run test:apos
scripts.test:vue: cd ./vue && npm run jest && npm run cy:run
scripts.cy:open: start-server-and-test 'cd ./apos && npm run test:dev' http-get://localhost:8080 'cypress open'
scripts.cy:run: start-server-and-test 'cd ./apos && npm run test:dev' http-get://localhost:8080 'cypress run'
